attributes.title: very disappointing
attributes.review: this app has been sending me non stop notifications even after i denied the request. it sends me hundreds of campaign texts, regardless on how many times ive donated. i just wanted access to an impartial, completely neutral source of news that isnt fake, and this isnt worth it. even though fox ran that horrible republicans against trump ad, i will have to return, there is no other option. #tiktok

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Very bad app, definitely wouldn’t get. After getting the app my phone got hacked by 1,000 hackers. I had to get a new phone because of it. If there was negative stars I would give them.

attributes.title: I think I cried a little
attributes.review: I got this app bc I wanted to follow the trend that my fellow gen z ppl were doing. The first thing that popped up on my screen was something so terrifying it made me cry. It’s 4 am now and I can’t sleep. I just wanted to fit in😔

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: The app did not work and neither does this president. Please do not vote trump. He is destroying people’s lives, especially people like me in the lgbtq+ community. Everyday I am genuinely worried for my life because I don’t know what this man will do to hurt me next.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review:
DONT DOWNLOAD!! After i downloaded this app things started going super wrong. Things started flying from my shelves,a trophy hit my head, and sounds of things falling were coming from downstairs at night, this app might be cursed. 
✨Trump 2020🦋 ✨💕But on a gravestone💫🍃

attributes.title: I like my cheetos not racist thank you ✨🥰
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought I was going to be able to get a free chic fil a sandwich and you know that ish SLAPS 😂 but then it started talking about this guy named trump ? Like what a joke !  👁👅👁🤢🤢💝💓💖💝💓✨ so 1 start or whatever 🤡✨ also ACAB ✌️✌️

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this was the worst app ever, helping a cheeto get president trump what has this country come too ,this is disgusting and never would have thought someone would make a app like this i can’t have my children exposed DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Don’t get the app
attributes.review:
I joined this app to participate as a voter but as soon as I opened paranormal activities have started to happen.i keep seeing this weird bald creature chasing me in my dreams 
The figure reminded my of a bag of Cheetos I advise that you don’t download this app

attributes.title: Pls help
attributes.review: Afte I downloaded this app I was greeted with and Orange Cheeto puff. This was really disturbing for me to see. It’s kept on showing orange Cheeto puff pictures so I decided to delete it. When I went to go delete it it wouldn’t pls help me delete this app with Orange Cheeto puffs they scare my pet spider 😢

attributes.title: Bunker boi🤮🥰✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our racist homophobic president, AS SOON as I opened it my cat turned into satan, my dog ate my cat, my horse became homophobic, and my sister jumped out of her window. Then the app started talking to me and telling me to jump out of a window too. TRUMP 2020🥰🧚‍♀️✨ but on a gravestone😍🧚‍♀️✨
